name: improved-terminal-system
description: Claude Code on the Webに触発された、モダンなWebベースターミナルシステム

scripts.setup: npm --prefix backend ci && npm --prefix frontend ci
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:existing: cd frontend && npx playwright test --config playwright.config.existing.ts
